text: 13.3 Mat 6.2 Tap yad mɨdupsek mɨdeb tek, bɨlok binɨb tap ma mɨdeb okok kɨlop ñenɨm, pen yad nɨŋɨd kelɨgenɨm bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk dɨl, mab yɨnub nab ak dɨyokel kumnɨgayn13.3 Glik takaw mɨj nedil tɨkɨlak okok, takaw anɨb ak mɨdupsek takaw nokom jɨmñɨl ma tɨkɨlak. Ogɨnap takaw tɨkɨl anɨb agɨlak, Bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk dɨl, mab yɨnub nab ak dɨyokel kumnɨgayn agɨl tɨkak. Ogɨnap pen tɨkɨl anɨb agɨlak, Bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk del, yad yɨb awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgayn agɨl tɨkɨlak. ak pen, binɨb kɨlop mapen ma lenɨm, tap genɨm anɨb okok yɨp gek mɨdtep gɨnɨm tek ma lɨnɨgab.
